step.title: 1. Fire the cannon at the castle
step.description: Aim the cannon at the Entrance Hall, then interact to fire the cannon.

step.title: 2. Power the Pack-a-Punch machine
step.description: Go to the Oubliette Room in the castle and break the locks on the crate. This will spawn a Doppelghast to kill. Pick up the Power Crystal from the Doppelghast, and interact to activate the Pack-a-Punch machine with the Power Crystal.

subsections.description: The radio is located in the Tavern, and the exfil location will be in spawn or on the castle wall.

pic.alt: Location 2 - Alchemical Lab between Stamin-Up and Vulture Aid
Speed Cola - between spawn and the castle
Melee Macchiato - in the entrance to the castle wall
Elemental Pop - in the entrance to the castle wall
Deadshot Daiquiri - between spawn and the castle, next to the Stables
Vulture Aid - in the Dining Hall
Der Wunderfizz - in the Tavern Loft (spawns at the start of round 25)

sections.description: Pick up a Stamp and give it to a Knight Statue.

subsections.description: Starting on round 10, zombies can spawn with a knight helmet. Kill a Helmeted Zombie to drop a Stamp. After 4 Stamps are used, Helmeted Zombies will no longer spawn.
Each Knight Statue will give a different Bastard Sword. All 4 swords start the same, but have different upgrades.

step.title: 1. Place the Dragon Bastard Sword
step.description: Interact on the Dragon Altar up the stairs from Juggernog to place the sword.

step.title: 2. Carry 3 Fires
step.description: There are 3 braziers with fire around the map. Collect the Dragon Fire and return it to the Dragon Altar. While holding the fire, you will slowly take damage and cannot switch to a weapon without dropping the fire. Melee zombies to refill your health.

pic.alt: Location 2 - through the door in spawn leading towards Deadshot Daiquiri
Location 3 - on the castle wall near Melee Macchiato

step.title: 3. Take Caliburn
step.description: Interact on the Dragon Altar to take Caliburn.

step.title: 1. Kill Glowing Parasites
step.description: After picking up the Lion Bastard Sword, Glowing Parasites will spawn. Kill 4 Glowing Parasites with the sword, and after each kill, melee the Sanctuary Door to transfer the Glowing Parasite Essence. The door is located between spawn and Speed Cola, and after each successful melee, a symbol will appear on the door.

step.title: 2. Enter the Sanctuary
step.description: Interact on the Sanctuary Door to enter the building. Place the Lion Bastard Sword in the Plinth of Light, then watch the 4 glowing symbols on the Plinth. One symbol will light up at a time, and you must shoot the corresponding symbol flying around the room. If all 4 are shot correctly, the puzzle is complete.

pic.alt: Plinth with glowing symbol to shoot

step.title: 3. Take Solais
step.description: Interact on the Plinth of Light to take Solais.

step.title: 1. Quick Revive Lightning Rod
step.description: The 3 Lightning Rods can be obtained in any order. After picking up the Stag Bastard Sword, go to Quick Revive and wait for a Heavy Zombie to spawn with a Lightning Rod on it. Kill the zombie and pick up the Lightning Rod.

step.title: 2. Deadshot Daiquiri Lightning Rod
step.description: The 3 Lightning Rods can be obtained in any order. A Lightning Rod will always spawn just to the left of Deadshot Daiquiri.

step.title: 3. Speed Cola Lightning Rod
step.description: The 3 Lightning Rods can be obtained in any order. Go to the left staircase down from Speed Cola and short circuit the fusebox with Dead Wire or a Shock Charge. This will cause a Lightning Rod to fall to the ground.

step.title: 4. Charge the Weather Machine
step.description: Go to the castle wall near Elemental Pop and insert the Lightning Rods into the Weather Machine. This will cause a storm around the machine, and lightning will occasionally hit your sword. Melee to transfer charge to the Weather Machine when the Stag Bastard Sword is sparking. When enough charge has been transfered, the storm will go away, and the Weather Machine will be sparking.

pic.alt: Weather Machine with all 3 Lightning Rods

step.title: 5. Take Durendal
step.description: Insert the sword into the Weather Machine to imbue the Stag Bastard Sword with Electricity. Interact on the Weather Machine to take Durendal.

step.title: 1. Retrieve an Antiquity
step.description: Go to the Alchemical Lab by the Dining Hall and pick up the Antiquity. There are 5 possible Antiquities, and only 1 will spawn each game.

pic.alt: Ram Horn - on the bookcase to the right of the tablet with the symbols
Scorpion Fossil - on a table next to a skull
Raven Skulls - on the bookcase to the left of the door to Stamin-Up
Jaw Bone - on the bookcase to the left of the door to Stamin-Up
Fish Fossil - on the bookcase to the right of the door to Stamin-Up

step.title: 2. Configure the Summoning Circle
step.description: Go to the Tavern Cellar near spawn and interact to place the Antiquity on the Summoning Circle. Interact again to place the Raven Bastard Sword, then interact a third time to configure the rings so the symbols and Antiquity match. The correct orientation for each Antiquity is shown below.

pic.alt: Correct orientation for Ram Horn Antiquity (üúÇ ‚ôàÔ∏é)
Correct orientation for Scorpion Fossil Antiquity (üúÑ ‚ôèÔ∏é)
Correct orientation for Raven Skulls Antiquity (üúÅ ‚ôäÔ∏é)
Correct orientation for Jaw Bone Antiquity (üúÇ ‚ôåÔ∏é)
Correct orientation for Fish Fossil Antiquity (üúÑ ‚ôìÔ∏é)

step.title: 3. Lure Shadow Entities to the Portals
step.description: A purple portal will appear on the floor near the Summoning Circle, and glowing orbs will start to move towards you. Stand near the Portal so the glowing orbs go through it. After enough orbs go through, the portal will move up to the Tavern main level, and then once more to the Tavern Loft.

step.title: 4. Take Balmung
step.description: Interact on the Summoning Circle to imbue the Raven Bastard Sword with Darkness. Interact again to take Balmung.

sections.description: Each upgraded sword has a matching incantation. The upgraded sword is required to unlock the incantation. You must also first talk to Krafft before certain incantation steps can be completed.

subsections.description: Go to the Dungeon and open the hatch on the wooden door. This will play a short ingame cutscene.
For Caliburn (Upgraded Dragon Bastard Sword).

step.title: 1. Light the Fire Beacons
step.description: There are 3 piles of logs around the castle wall that must be ignited using Caliburn's Special Attack or Molotovs. Once all 3 are lit, a Doppelghast will spawn and drop Ra's Ankh when killed. Interact to pick it up.

pic.alt: Fire beacon 3 - above the Entrance Hall

step.title: 2. Fire Ritual
step.description: In the courtyard, a yellow sigil will appear on the floor. Interact to initiate the Fire Ritual, then kill zombies by any means until the Incantation Box appears.

step.title: 3. Open the Incantation Box
step.description: Melee the Incantation Box with Caliburn to unlock the new tactical for all players. 3 more locations for the Fire Incantation will appear around the map.

pic.alt: Fire Incantation 2 - in the Dining Hall
Fire Incantation 4 - in the Tavern Cellar

subsections.description: For Solais (Upgraded Lion Bastard Sword).

step.title: 1. Direct the Light
step.description: Above the fireplace in the Dining Hall is a crystal that can be shot to generate a light beam. Shoot the crystal at different angles until the beam of light focuses on the next crystal, then do the same for the following crystals. Eventually, the light beam will be redirected to reveal Paladin's Brooch. Interact to pick it up.

pic.alt: Focused light beam bouncing off the next crystal

step.title: 2. Light Ritual
step.description: Back in the Dining Hall, a yellow sigil will appear on the floor. Interact to initiate the Light Ritual, then kill zombies by any means until the Incantation Box appears.

step.title: 3. Open the Incantation Box
step.description: Melee the Incantation Box with Solais to unlock the new tactical for all players. 3 more locations for the Light Incantation will appear around the map.

pic.alt: Light Incantation 1 - in the Dining Hall
Light Incantation 3 - next to Melee Macchiato
Light Incantation 4 - between spawn and Speed Cola

subsections.description: For Durendal (Upgraded Stag Bastard Sword).

step.title: 1. Electrify the Horseshoe
step.description: In the Stables by Deadshot Daiquiri, shoot the horseshoe off the wall and interact to pick it up. Then, use the Rampart Cannon fast travel to launch yourself towards spawn. This will cause the horseshoe to be electrified and fly to 1 of 2 locations. Look for a storm cloud to find the electrified horseshoe. Interact to pick it up.

pic.alt: Horseshoe to shoot in the Stables
Storm cloud location 1 - between spawn and Deadshot Daiquiri
Storm cloud location 2 - between spawn and Speed Cola

step.title: 2. Electric Ritual
step.description: In spawn, a yellow sigil will appear on the floor. Interact to initiate the Electric Ritual, then kill zombies by any means until the Incantation Box appears.

step.title: 3. Open the Incantation Box
step.description: Melee the Incantation Box with Durendal to unlock the new tactical for all players. 3 more locations for the Electric Incantation will appear around the map.

pic.alt: Electric Incantation 2 - in the Dining Hall
Electric Incantation 3 - down the steps from Melee Macchiato

subsections.description: For Balmung (Upgraded Raven Bastard Sword).

step.title: 1. Shoot the Raven
step.description: Use the Cave Slide fast travel and shoot the raven inside. Then, shoot the raven as it flies around the map so it drops its talon. Alternatively, before shooting the raven right away, you can follow it around the map for several minutes, and it will eventually drop a Random Perk power-up. After shooting the raven from the sky, interact to pick up the Raven's Talon.

step.title: 2. Dark Ritual
step.description: In the Undercroft, a yellow sigil will appear on the floor. Interact to initiate the Dark Ritual, then kill zombies by any means until the Incantation Box appears.

step.title: 3. Open the Incantation Box
step.description: Melee the Incantation Box with Balmung to unlock the new tactical for all players. 3 more locations for the Dark Incantation will appear around the map.

pic.alt: Dark Incantation 2 - in the Dining Hall
Dark Incantation 3 - next to Elemental Pop

subsections.description: Go to the Dungeon and open the hatch on the wooden door. This will play a short ingame cutscene.
In the Tavern at spawn, there are 6 bottles labelled with Roman Numerals from I to VI. Interact on the bottles to reveal the mystic symbols, then memorize the 6 symbols in the correct order.

pic.alt: Bottle 2 - on a table by the Exfil radio
Bottle 3 - on a table in the corner by the bar
Bottle 5 - on a table by the Exfil radio

subsections.header: 3. Shoot the Symbols in the Undercroft
subsections.description: Go to the Undercroft next to the Pack-a-Punch room, and use Melee Macchiato to smash the wall and reveal the symbols. Then, shoot the 6 symbols in the order indicated by the bottles. After each symbol is shot, the rest of the symbols will rearrange on the wall. When done successfully, the wall to the left of the symbols will vanish, revealing the Codex.

There are 4 torn pages with red symbols that randomly spawn around the Sitting Rooms by Stamin-Up. Each page has several spawn locations, but will always be around the same general location. Interact to pick them up, then restore the torn pages to the Codex. This will make 4 red symbols appear on the Codex.

pic.alt: General location of page 1 - around some boxes by the door leading towards the Entrance Hall
General location of page 2 - around the bunk beds
General location of page 3 - around the couch, TV, or Stamin-Up
General location of page 4 - around the door to the Alchemical Lab

subsections.description: Each of the 4 symbols in the Codex matches one of the Point of Power traps around the map. Activate the traps in the order indicated by the Codex (top left, bottom left, top right, then bottom right), and get enough kills until the trap stops early. After each Point of Power is finished, its symbol will stop glowing in the Codex. The final Point of Power is always in the Stamin-Up room, and after it's completed, an orb will move towards the Undercroft Stairway and create symbols for the next step.

pic.alt: Location 6 - between spawn and Speed Cola

subsections.description: On the wall of the Undercroft Stairway, the 4 knight symbols are numbered from I to IV. In this order, make each of the 4 Knight Statues salute. To make the statue salute, use the corresponding incantation on the statue, then quicky use the inspect weapon control on the corresponding upgraded sword. When all 4 statues have saluted in the correct order, they will summon the Mystic Orb. The Dragon Knight Statue corresponds to the Fire Incantation and Caliburn. The Lion Knight Statue corresponds to the Light Incantation and Solais. The Stag Knight Statue corresponds to the Electric Incantation and Durendal. The Raven Knight Statue corresponds to the Dark Incantation and Balmung.

pic.alt: Wall indicating the Knight Statue order

subsections.description: There are 4 elemental challenges around the map that must be completed to fully charge the Mystic Orb. The challenges can be completed in any order, and each one is started by placing the Mystic Orb, then interacting again to begin. After each challenge, be sure to pick up the Mystic Orb.

step.title: Light Challenge
step.description: The Mystic Orb location is upstairs in the Dining Hall. For this challenge, you must run through the Light Spheres to collect them. If enough Light Spheres are collected before the timer ends, the challenge is complete.

step.title: Dark Challenge
step.description: The Mystic Orb location is in the Undercroft. For this challenge, get dark elemental kills by using Balmung's Special Attack, Dark Incantations, Shadow Rift, etc. If enough elemental kills are secured before the timer ends, the challenge is complete.

step.title: Electric Challenge
step.description: The Mystic Orb location is in spawn. For this challenge, get electric elemental kills by using Durendal's Special Attack, Electric Incantations, Dead Wire, etc. If enough elemental kills are secured before the timer ends, the challenge is complete.

step.title: Fire Challenge
step.description: The Mystic Orb location is in the Courtyard. For this challenge, get fire elemental kills by using Caliburn's Special Attack, Fire Incantations, Napalm Burst, Molotovs, etc. If enough elemental kills are secured before the timer ends, the challenge is complete.

subsections.description: Go to the Undercroft Stairway and place the fully charged Mystic Orb to open the sealed door. Interact on the Guardian Key to activate the Ancient Mystic's message, then interact again to pick it up.
You cannot leave the boss fight until it's done. Make sure you have perks, armor, strong weapons, and anything else you want to bring.

step.title: Start the Final Encounter
step.description: Go to spawn and interact on the Guardian Statue to insert the Guardian Key. This will teleport all players to the boss fight arena and start the fight.

step.title: Damaging the Guardian
step.description: Shoot the glowing parts of the Guardian to deal critical damage. Throughout the fight, the Guardian will occasionally lock in place and become immune. During this time, lava will block off more of the arena. Once the Guardian is defeated, pick up the Amulet to complete the main quest and play a cutscene.

subsections.description: Interact with 3 Mister Peeks headphones.

pic.alt: Location 1 - on a table in the Tavern
Location 2 - in the Courtyard by the door to Speed Cola
Location 3 - in the Undercroft by a couch

subsections.description: Using the Caliburn sword, melee the 3 braziers from the upgrade process to relight them. After all 3 are lit, the Caliburn song will play.

pic.alt: Location 2 - through the door in spawn leading towards Deadshot Daiquiri
Location 3 - on the castle wall near Melee Macchiato

subsections.description: You must be playing as the Maya operator to do this side quest. Starting on round 12, the radio to the left of Vulture Aid will start beeping morse code. Interact on the radio, then after the dialogue plays, interact on the door to enter a secret area. Kill the Vermin and Doppelghast, then kill the special Laurent Doppelghast to drop the keys. Pick up the keys and use them to unlock a door. Going down the stairs will play a cutscene, then teleport you back to the Dining Hall. Some loot will spawn, including a Legendary GS45.

pic.alt: Radio and door to the left of Vulture Aid

subsections.description: Find the chess knight in 1 of 4 locations and bring it to the chess board by Stamin-Up. Then, get kills around the chess board until the knight appears in the map. The chess knight will kill zombies and follow you around the map for a couple minutes.

pic.alt: Location 1 - in the Tavern Cellar, on a shelf between some cans and bottles
Location 2 - near Elemental Pop, on a desk
Location 3 - upstairs from Juggernog, on a table in the hallway to the Dining Hall
Location 4 - near Quick Revive, on a table

subsections.description: Pick up 3 bottles of alcohol around the map and return them to the Tavern. Interact on the alcohol glasses to start a bartender minigame. Serve zombies the correct drinks, and you will eventually get PhD Flopper upon leaving the bar.

pic.alt: Location 1 - in the Dining Hall, under the table by the couch
Location 2 - in the Alchemical Lab, on the bottom shelf across from Stamin-Up
Location 3 - in the Undercroft, under the table by the couch

subsections.description: There are 4 locations for Mister Peeks around the map, and each time you shoot him, he will appear at the next location. The order is the same every game. After shooting him in the final location, you will get a free random perk.

pic.alt: Location 1 - near Elemental Pop, seen through a window
Location 2 - near Deadshot Daiquiri, seen through a hole in the Stables wall
Location 3 - seen from the Dining Hall, in a window on a castle tower
Location 4 - near Quick Revive, in a cell

subsections.description: During the Dark Incantation step, after shooting the raven from the Cave Slide, wait before shooting it in the sky. Instead, follow the raven as it circles the map for several minutes. Eventually, it will drop a Random Perk power-up.

pic.alt: Red spark flying to the ground

subsections.description: Any time after completing the wall runes main quest step, use all 4 incantations on the wall to relight the symbols. After all 4 rows are lit up, a lockdown will begin in the Undercroft. After several waves of enemies are killed, a Random Perk power-up and some Ammo Mods will drop.

To unlock the well, wait for a bug round and stare at the well between spawn and Speed Cola until a Vermin crawls out. Kill the Vermin that crawled out, then throw a Frag or Concussion into the well. This will cause essence to fly out of the well. After this, you can now interact on the well during any round to drop some points. You can retrieve these points by throwing another Frag or Concussion into the well on any future bug round.

pic.alt: Vermin crawling out of the well

subsections.description: Quickly light the 4 fireplaces around the map by using the Caliburn melee attack, Molotovs, or Thermo Grenades. If all 4 were lit in enough time, the fireplaces will shoot fireballs at zombies for a short time. This can be repeated every time the fireplace logs respawn (after 5 rounds).

pic.alt: Location 3 - in the Alchemical Lab, left of the Arsenal

subsections.description: Break a cheese display window in spawn and grab the cheese. Then, scare 10 rats around the map by walking up and staring at them. When all 10 rats are waiting around a plate by Pack-a-Punch, interact to place the cheese. This will drop some loot, including a crown that can be worn.

pic.alt: Rat 1 - by spawn, under a van just through the door to Speed Cola
Rat 2 - in spawn, under a planter by the door leading to Deadshot Daiquiri
Rat 3 - near Deadshot Daiquiri, outside the zombie spawn hole in the stone circle
Rat 4 - on the castle wall, under the wooden stairs to the Rampart Cannon on the Melee Macchiato side
Rat 5 - near Juggernog, under a chair to the right of the main staircase
Rat 6 - in the Dining Hall, under a wooden pallet by the Stag Knight Statue
Rat 7 - in the Alchemical Lab, behind the tablet with the symbols
Rat 8 - near Stamin-Up, under a bench by the bunk bed in the corner
Rat 9 - in the Undercroft, just right of the Mystery Box location
Rat 10 - near Quick Revive, in the cell to the left of the gun wall-buy

subsections.description: After using the cannon to open the castle entrance, the crank wheel will fly to spawn. Pick up the crank wheel and the blowtorch, then interact to place the wheel back on the Rampart Cannon. You can now rotate the Rampart Cannon between going to spawn and going to the Dining Hall. If you then use the Rampart Cannon fast travel 100 times (in either direction), when you next take the fast travel to spawn, you will hit the clock tower. This will drop 2 Cymbal Monkeys, and the tower itself will attract zombies for a short time.

pic.alt: Crank wheel - at spawn, in a box of bananas
Blowtorch - in the Dining Hall, to the right of the fireplace

subsections.description: Shoot any pool ball to sink them all. 100 Essence will drop next to the pool table.

pic.alt: Pool table, in the Tavern Loft

sections.description: There are 8 hidden power-ups around the map that can be shot or exploded to collect.

pic.alt: In a window near Speed Cola
In the Alchemical Lab, through a barrier to the right of the armor wall-buy
In the Undercroft, behind a couch (you may need to break a box in the way first)
In the Dining Hall, on the broken roof opposite of Vulture Aid
In spawn, above the Cave Slide exit, on some scaffolding
On the castle wall, seen from a fence by Deadshot Daiquiri

subsections.description: Spawns after all 7 other hidden power-ups have been collected.

pic.alt: In the well by Speed Cola
